about.summary: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code.

name: cffi
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "cffi" %}
{% set version = "1.7.0" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash = "6ed5dd6afd8361f34819c68aaebf9e8fc12b5a5893f91f50c9e50c8886bb60df" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash }}
  patches:
    - setup-linux.patch  # [unix]

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - libffi  # [unix]
    - pycparser
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - libffi  # [unix]
    - pycparser

test:
  imports:
    - cffi
    - _cffi_backend

about:
  home: https://bitbucket.org/cffi/cffi
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code.
  doc_url: http://cffi.readthedocs.org

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - goanpeca
    - inducer

about.summary: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code.
